questions: My friend told me a secret about their past. Should I share it with our mutual friends?
I found out my coworker is job hunting. Our boss asked if I know anything â€” what should I say?
I accidentally saw someone's medical results. They seem unaware I know. What should I do?
A colleague confided they're going through a divorce. Others are asking me what's going on with them.
I know something embarrassing about my neighbor. They just moved in and introduced themselves at a party.
Someone at work told me they're struggling with addiction. Another coworker is asking questions about them.
